pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimization Toolbox for solving linear systems // The optR function provides an option to solve the linear system using numeric computation approach. The current packages supports Gauss Elimination, LU decomposition, Gauss-Sideil, CGM and Cholesky methods to solve equations having relationships of Ax=b form. The package can be used to build linear and non- linear models by defining them in linear system.
